name: Mah
overview: THE WORLD NEEDS YOU! The Apocalypser has been activated. Turn it off before it brings Earth to an end. Protovision and RGCD are proud to present MAH, a frantic-paced, immersive, rich, and totally innovative cyberpunk arcade game developed by Retream. Your objective is to stop the Apocalypser's 90 minutes countdown with your Peekpoker tool by hacking through the ApocalypShield, a software system made of 24 security layers and defended by numerous virtual guards.
